ygData.subject: Re: FireStrike's Rage
ygData.msgSnippet: Firestrike looked at him confused.  He was sure he was about to be blasted. Not letting sign of relief he just stood there steering into the eyes of Megatron.

Firestrike looked at him confused.  He was sure he was about to be 
blasted. Not letting sign of relief he just stood there steering into 
the eyes of Megatron.

--- In nbwrpg@y..., robertdahl <rdahl@t...> wrote:
> Megatron slowly raised his fusiond cannon, his hand palm down. The 
sneer
> on his broken face showed his fury. He then brought his other hand 
up,
> palm facing up, and clapped, and laughed. "Very good, Bravo, Bravo.
> Someone I know said something like that, a very long time ago." 
Megatron
> told them.
